If you’ve had any contact with the UK northeast music scene in the past year or so you’ll be familiar with **Niall Greaves’** work.

For a period he regularly designed the posters for large free parties around the city; they were disconcerting and disturbing doodles that found majesty when presented in the public arena. It’s easy to describe **Greaves’** illustrations as disturbing and that alone, but in reality they have a subtlety that much design work lacks. Nothing is heavy handed, his repeated uses of imagery and text creates a sprawling world, with each piece or poster becoming another line in the story. As well as this, the characters he produces have a humanity to them despite their unearthly aspects, they suggest at tensions and motivations in exciting and detailed ways.

_Check out the sideshow above and if you want to know more check out his [blog.](http://fkfreaks.tumblr.com)_
